Name: Stormterror's Lair
Title: Stormterror's Lair
Desc: The ambitious dream was built proudly upon the capital of the God of Storms, and collapsed to ruin under the lofty song of freedom.

Talent.Name: Stormterror's Lair
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When played:</color> Draw 1 random {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card from your deck.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card, or when your character uses a Skill with an original cost of at least 4 Elemental Dice: </color>Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 3</color>

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
